### generateWaitcnt() {#aba82e76518953661f6dcb009c73e1a1f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SIInsertWaitcnts::generateWaitcnt (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/amdgpu/waitcnt">AMDGPU::Waitcnt</a> Wait, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab6395548cae73865213e279ae461db54">MachineBasicBlock::instr&#95;iterator</a> It, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; Block, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siinsertwaitcnts-cpp-/waitcntbrackets">WaitcntBrackets</a> &amp; ScoreBrackets, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; OldWaitcntInstr)</>}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siinsertwaitcnts-cpp/#l00730">730</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siinsertwaitcnts-cpp">SIInsertWaitcnts.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### generateWaitcntInstBefore() {#a8a42c531875f7db92f2c697b823654b5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SIInsertWaitcnts::generateWaitcntInstBefore (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siinsertwaitcnts-cpp-/waitcntbrackets">WaitcntBrackets</a> &amp; ScoreBrackets, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; OldWaitcntInstr, bool FlushVmCnt)</>}>
Generate s&#95;waitcnt instruction to be placed before cur&#95;Inst.

Instructions of a given type are returned in order, but instructions of different types can complete out of order. We rely on this in-order completion and simply assign a score to the memory access instructions. We keep track of the active &quot;score bracket&quot; to determine if an access of a memory read requires an s&#95;waitcnt and if so what the value of each counter is. The &quot;score bracket&quot; is bound by the lower bound and upper bound scores (&#42;&#95;score&#95;LB and &#42;&#95;score&#95;ub respectively). If FlushVmCnt is true, that means that we want to generate a s&#95;waitcnt to flush the vmcnt counter here.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siinsertwaitcnts-cpp/#l00726">726</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siinsertwaitcnts-cpp">SIInsertWaitcnts.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a51964e59ed1cde09d8e6d578e9c46d83}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;SIInsertWaitcnts.cpp&#125;::SIInsertWaitcnts::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp; AU) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.
